name: DestroyActor
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3.7 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Destroy an actor which was created with CreateActor.

params_body.name: actorid
params_body.description: The ID of the actor to destroy. Returned by CreateActor.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. The actor with the ID specified does not exist.
